Class WindowShape

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends ObjectShape
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

        public WindowShape(Interaction interaction,
                   View view,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int width,
                   int height)
        A constructor for creating the window shape arround the diagram.
        Parameters:
        interaction - The controller of the diagram.
        view - The view of the diagram.
        x - The given x-corodinate of the window's shape.
        y - The given y-coordiante of the window's shape.
        width - Width of the windows shape.
        height - Height of the windows shape.
